actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a refundable credit to taxpayers who vote in Federal elections.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a $30 ($60 for both spouses) refundable income tax credit for voting in Federal elections. Requires that the taxpayer document such voting.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide a refundable credit to taxpayers who vote in Federal elections.
